items.sentence: Have you forgotten everything we\'ve done for you?
I can\'t imagine what Tom might be thinking about.
I can\'t necessarily agree with you on that point.
I can\'t remember the last time I took a vacation.
Is it true that you\'ve never played poker before?
It hurts to have to say this, but it\'s the truth.
Tom sat on that park bench for nearly three hours.
Tom says he can hold his breath for three minutes.
Tom says he never lies to Mary, but he often does.
Tom says he wants to learn how to fly an airplane.
